title: Joint Finance Committee Update, Milwaukee Garden, Status Of Wisconsin Economy
teaser: A UW-Madison economist says recent job and wage reports paint a misleading picture of Wisconsin's economy. We discuss the state of the economy, and what the numbers really mean. We also get the story behind a Milwaukee garden that is trying to bring the community together, and catch up on the latest news on the budget and Joint Finance Committee hearings.
